destroySurface(javax.microedition.khrono.FullName: public abstract void destroySurface (EGL10 egl, EGLDisplay display, EGLSurface surface)

Returns: null if the surface cannot be constructed.
createWindowSurface(javax.microedition.k.FullName: public abstract EGLSurface createWindowSurface (EGL10 egl, EGLDisplay display, EGLConfig config, Object nativeWindow)

ClassDesc: An interface for customizing the eglCreateWindowSurface and eglDestroySurface calls. This interface must be implemented by clients wishing to call @B_android#opengl#GLSurfaceView#setEGLWindowSurfaceFactory_E@
